price: ইয়াৰ পিছতো সিহঁতৰ বাবে থাকিব উতলা পানীৰ মিশ্ৰণ।
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا لَشَوۡبٗا مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma inna lahum ʿalayhā lashawban min ḥamīmin
